li.p: A look at key dates for the Baltimore Ravens in the upcoming months.
li.cite: about 16 hours ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

li.p: With 19 days before the start of the NFL draft, many analysts have the Ravens taking a playmaking CB or a fast-rising WR with the No. 26 overall pick.
li.cite: about 1 day ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

h3.a: Ravens' recent drafts have not addressed the offense

li.p: The Baltimore Ravens are one of three teams not to take an offensive player in the first round in the past five NFL drafts.
li.cite: about 1 day ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

h3.a: Ravens' respect for Troy Polamalu runs deep

li.p: It was Troy Polamalu's ability to make game-changing plays that defined his career and garnered high respect from his fiercest rivals.
li.cite: about 2 days ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

li.p: The Baltimore Ravens' 2015 preseason schedule has a familiar feel to it.
li.cite: about 2 days ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

h3.a: Mel Kiper Jr. mock 4.0: Ravens land a cornerback

li.p: Mel Kiper Jr. has the Baltimore Ravens zeroed in on Washington cornerback Marcus Peters once again.
li.cite: about 2 days ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

h3.a: Ravens surprisingly re-sign OL Jah Reid

li.p: In perhaps the most unexpected move of their offseason, the Baltimore Ravens re-signed underachieving offensive lineman Jah Reid to a one-year deal.
li.cite: about 2 days ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

h3.a: Why Eric DeCosta has remained with the Ravens

li.p: Why is Eric DeCosta so loyal to the Ravens? He doesn't appear in a rush to become the final decision-maker for a team.
li.cite: about 2 days ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

h3.a: John Harbaugh praises NFL's first female full-time official

li.p: Sarah Thomas worked a Baltimore preseason game last season and "did a good job," Harbaugh said.
li.cite: about 3 days ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com

h3.a: Ravens met with Marcus Peters, Dorial Green-Beckham

li.p: The Ravens' recent hard-line stance on off-the-field problems doesn't mean they will keep their distance from players with character concerns.
li.cite: about 3 days ago | Jamison Hensley | ESPN.com
